meaning: the process of finding solutions to difficult or complex issues
the objective analysis and evaluation of an issue to form a judgment
detailed examination of the elements or structure of something
the making of a judgment about the amount, number, or value of something
the evaluation or estimation of the nature, quality, or ability of someone or something
the action of thinking about something in a logical, sensible way
reasoning conducted or assessed according to strict principles of validity
the capacity to gain an accurate and deep understanding of someone or something
a particular attitude toward or way of regarding something
the ability to comprehend or grasp the meaning of something
